report.name: ppcm_listpers_g

dataSource.name: Q_LISTPERS_GROUPE
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours (pour les SG ou sans contrat pour les SSII) select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, res.rtel tel_g, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble_g, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau_g, sit.ident ident_g, res.matricule matricule_g, sit.prestation prestation_g, sit.soccode societe_g, decode(sit.soccode, 'SG..', '****', decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Intervenant forfait',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout_g, st.gnom responsable_g, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy'))) echeance_g, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO_g, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA_g from situ_ress_full sit, ligne_cont lc, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm
where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm and sit.ident=res.ident and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg and sit.ident=lc.ident and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and to_char(l.lresdeb,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(l.lresfin,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or l.lresfin is null) ) and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE
UNION -- cas 2 -- ressource avec une situation en cours sans contrat select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, res.rtel tel_g, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble_g, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau_g, sit.ident ident_g, res.matricule matricule_g, sit.prestation prestation_g, sit.soccode societe_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..', '****', decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Intervenant forfait',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout_g, st.gnom responsable_g, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****','')) echeance_g, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO_g, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA_g from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm
where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm and sit.ident=res.ident and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' --pas de contrat and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) &P_WHERE
order by nom_g,prenom_g;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )
decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , '' , decode ( sit.soccode , 'SG..' , '****' , to_char ( lc.lresfin , 'dd/mm/yyyy' ) ) )
decode ( sit.soccode , 'SG..' , '****' , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 'Intervenant forfait' , to_char ( sit.cout , 'FM999999999D00' ) ) )

function.name: m_groupeformattrigger
afterpform
cf_tot_sg_gratuit_gformula
cf_total_sg_gformula
cf_total_ssii_gformula
cf_total_ress_gformula
m_liste_nom3formattrigger
